attributes.additional_details:
Bradley manning leaking information about collateral murder from us troops is not a crime.

Edward Snowden leaking information about the mass surveillance on all US citizens without due cause is not a crime.

Jullian Assange making wiki leaks which was a cause of the Tunisian uprising is not a crime.

Stop breaching human rights in order for defense contractors to make more money. The UK is meant to be the leader for Human Rights, but the police state that we now live in has changed this.
